definition: to think hard/bitter thoughts/to pour out one's sufferings
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
to think/to consider
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
to view one's past as miserable and one's present as happy (idiom)
to rack one's brains/to think hard

sentences.english: The director noodled for two days for only one scene.
sentences.chinese: 就爲了一個鏡頭，導演苦思冥想了兩天時間。

sentences.english: His dizzy revery lasted all night long.
sentences.chinese: 他經過了一整夜的頭暈目眩的苦思。

sentences.english: Anxiously I ponder the ways I might reduce my shoe size.
sentences.chinese: 我苦思冥想怎麼才能縮小“鞋號”。

sentences.english: She languished for her husband in the army.
sentences.chinese: 她苦思在軍隊服役的丈夫。

sentences.english: He strained to look for a good method to save his patient.
sentences.chinese: 他爲找出拯救病人生命的好方法而苦思冥想。

sentences.english: He puzzled his brains to find an answer .
Meditation won’t miraculously erase your stress overnight.
sentences.chinese: 苦思冥想不會在一夜之間奇蹟般得消除你的壓力。

sentences.english: Think hard, you will have a good idea.
She tasked her mind with that.
She racked her brains thinking of how to make a success of the job.
sentences.chinese: 她苦思苦想，考慮如何勝利完成這項工作。

sentences.english: We are puzzling about the easiest way to cross the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我們在苦思越過這座山的最佳路徑。

definition: to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
to think deeply/to ponder
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to mull over (idiom)/to think long and hard
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to contemplate/to ponder/contemplation/meditation
to remain puzzled after pondering over sth a hundred times (idiom)/to remain perplexed despite much thought
to fail to grasp the main points
to think sth through/to consider carefully
to consider/to ponder
to hesitate
long moan and short gasp (idiom); continually moaning and groaning in pain
silent/speechless
